name: Blacksite
description: Modern day fears come to life in a familiar, yet extraordinary setting: A small American town swarming with alien life. The government is desperate, struggling to contain secrets so terrible they can no longer be kept. Everything hinges on the actions of Aeran Pierce, a former Special Forces assassin thrown into one of the most explosive moments in American history.  A Living, Breathing Squad Lead well and your squad will rally in battle. Waver and their morale will sink, affecting their tactics and their will to fight.  One-Button Squad Command Issue orders to your troops, directing them to plant C-4, snipe an enemy from long range or take control of vehicles left behind by the wounded.   Battle Online Dominate the masses in modes like Team-Death-Match and Human vs. Reborn  Drive, Shoot & Ride Drive the latest military vehicles or take position in the gunner’s chair in daring, low-level helicopter raids.
